body.name: Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp, LED Corner Lamp Works with Alexa, Smart Modern Floor Lamp with Music Sync and 16 Million DIY Colors, Color Changing Standing Floor Lamp for Bedroom Living Room Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 52 mins
features: Dynamic RGBIC Color: Unleash your creativity with Govee RGBIC technology, you can customize each segment color base on nature, festival and emotion, and the floor lamp will display multicolor effects simultaneously, suitable for holiday and family gifts.

Smart Control: Manage your LED floor lamp with simple voice commands via Alexa, Google Assistant. And Govee Home APP also make it more convenient to enjoy multiple dynamic scenes like Cheerful, Romantic and design your living room or bedroom decorations.

Sync with Music: Elevate your movie, party, gaming time or listening session with our modern floor lamps for living room, the color and brightness of it will change simultaneously as music or gaming audio changes.

16 Million DIY Colors: The floor lamp owns millions of color and 58 Dynamic scene modes, you can explore your favored one or pick one for Christmas decorations, to bring yourself to a real fantastic lighting experience(only support 2.4Ghz WiFi).

Wide Application: Add exciting, expressive, and personalized lighting to your gaming room, living room and Christmas decorations indoor. With unique shape and weight design, you can move this standing floor lamp in your house freely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp, and I must say, it has exceeded all my expectations! This sleek and modern lamp has become the perfect addition to my home, adding a touch of style and ambiance that I didn't know I was missing.The RGBIC technology is a game-changer. The lamp is not just a source of light; it's a customizable piece of art. The range of colors is incredible, and the transition effects are mesmerizing. I love being able to set the mood in any room with just a few taps on the Govee Home app.Setting up the lamp was a breeze. The instructions were clear, and the app connected seamlessly with the device. I appreciate the user-friendly interface, making it easy for even a tech novice like me to navigate through the various settings.One of the standout features for me is the music sync. It's like having my own personal light show that dances to the rhythm of my favorite tunes. Whether I'm unwinding after a long day or hosting a small get-together, the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp adds an extra layer of entertainment.The build quality is fantastic. The lamp feels sturdy and well-made, and the adjustable height ensures that it fits perfectly in any space. The remote control is a convenient touch, allowing me to change settings without reaching for my phone.Overall, the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp has transformed the atmosphere in my home. It's not just a lighting fixture; it's an experience. If you're looking to elevate your living space with a touch of modernity and a splash of color, I highly recommend the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp. It's a brilliant combination of style, functionality, and innovation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This light is pretty cool for matching any mood and adding some in sync color changing to music. Great purchase and easy configuration in about 10 minutes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Captivating Fusion of Light and Design
reviews.reviewText: The Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp has truly taken my home lighting experience to a whole new level. This LED corner lamp effortlessly combines striking design with cutting-edge technology, delivering a mesmerizing display of colors and an atmosphere that transforms any room into a captivating space.The first thing that caught my attention was the lamp's contemporary and elegant design. The sleek, slim profile and minimalist aesthetics make it a perfect fit for modern interiors. Placing it in the corner of my living room, it immediately became a conversation starter, drawing compliments from friends and family alike.The RGBIC (Red, Green, Blue, Indigo, Cyan) technology sets this floor lamp apart from traditional lighting options. With the addition of indigo and cyan LEDs, the lamp achieves a more comprehensive color spectrum, resulting in smoother transitions and richer hues. The visual effects are stunning, especially when the lamp is set to cycle through various colors.The Govee Home app is a game-changer when it comes to customizing the lighting experience. The app's intuitive interface allows me to choose from a vast selection of colors, adjust brightness, and create personalized lighting scenes that suit different moods and occasions. Syncing the lamp with my music playlists and movie sessions creates an immersive audio-visual experience that adds an extra dimension to my entertainment.Installation was a breeze, thanks to the clear instructions and user-friendly design. The lamp's adjustable height and flexible head make it easy to direct the light exactly where I want it. Whether I need focused task lighting or prefer an ambient glow, the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp caters to all my lighting needs.The built-in smart features are a delightful addition. With compatibility for voice assistants like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, I can effortlessly control the lamp with simple voice commands, adding convenience and ease to my daily routines.The lamp's sturdiness and build quality are impressive, ensuring long-lasting durability. The stable base and high-quality materials make it a reliable and safe addition to any living space.I particularly appreciate the Energy-saving Mode, which helps reduce energy consumption when needed without compromising on performance or visual appeal. The lamp's low power consumption makes it an eco-friendly choice for those conscious of their environmental footprint.The only minor improvement I could suggest is to add a remote control option, as it would provide an alternative method for those who prefer not to use their smartphones for controlling the lamp.In conclusion, the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp has exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Its seamless integration of aesthetics, versatility, and advanced lighting technology sets it apart as a top-tier LED corner lamp. If you're seeking a stylish and dynamic lighting solution to elevate your home decor and create a captivating ambiance, look no further than the Govee RGBIC Floor Lamp. It's a captivating fusion of light and design that will transform your living space into a mesmerizing sanctuary of color and charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Stylish and Functional Addition to My Home
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Govee Floor Lamp, and it has been a welcome addition to my home. While it's not perfect, it offers a good balance of style and functionality, earning a solid 4-star rating from me.Let's start with the positives. The design of this floor lamp is modern and sleek. It fits well with the decor in my living room and adds a touch of elegance to the space. The build quality is decent, and the lamp feels sturdy and durable.The adjustable lighting is a standout feature. I appreciate the range of brightness levels and color temperatures this lamp offers. It's great for creating different moods and settings in the room. The remote control is a handy addition, allowing me to change the lighting from the comfort of my couch.Assembly was straightforward, and I had the lamp up and running in no time. The included instructions were clear, and all the necessary parts were included.However, there are a few areas where I believe there's room for improvement. First, the lamp's stability could be better. While it hasn't been a major issue, I've noticed some wobbling when adjusting the height or angle of the lamp. It could benefit from a more robust base design.Additionally, I've encountered occasional connectivity issues with the APP. Sometimes, I have to press the buttons multiple times to get a response, which can be a bit frustrating.Despite these minor drawbacks, the Govee Floor Lamp has been a valuable addition to my home. It offers versatility in lighting options and enhances the overall atmosphere of my living space. With some improvements in stability and remote responsiveness, it could easily earn a full 5-star rating. If you're looking for a stylish and functional floor lamp, this one is definitely worth considering.

I'm a huge fan of Govee products, and this lamp has been no exception. It's simply amazing! The variety of light options it offers is a standout feature, allowing me to set the perfect mood for any situation. Whether I'm working, reading, or just relaxing, this lamp has a setting that fits my needs. The light quality is top-notch, and the lamp itself is a sleek addition to my space.However, there's a bit of a hiccup when it comes to the accompanying app. While I appreciate the convenience of controlling the lamp through my phone, the app experience doesn't quite match up to the quality of the lamp itself. It can be a tad unresponsive and lacks the intuitive design that would make it truly user-friendly. Despite this, the lamp's performance is so impressive that I still find it a valuable part of my home.If you're considering this lamp and are a fan of Govee's range, I'd definitely recommend it. I'll be a Govee buyer for life!

La razón principal por la que adquirí está lámpara después de pensarlo por bastante tiempo fue que los focos regulares pueden llegar a molestar la vista, así que buscaba una luz indirecta para el cuarto y sala de estar. Este producto me sorprendió desde el momento que llegó a mis manos, fácil de ensamblar, aplicación intuitiva, fácil de sincronizar, amplia variedad de modos y colores para elegir, se puede escoger el nivel de brillo, la lámpara en si se ve bastante elegante y por el precio en que lo encontré, definitivamente vale la pena.
Mi escritorio está en una esquina, por lo que está luz es lo máximo para que en la cámara se vea algo de reflejos. La personalización de Govee también es lo máximo
easy to build, easy to use! so many modes to change. wish they provide remote controller aswell.

reviews.reviewTitle: Product is solid and reviews were helpful
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a floor lamp for a while to have some light in behind the TV and found this one. Read the reviews and purchased it. Instructions were clear and easy to follow and despite my lack of new age technology I had it working from the app on my phone within an hour of opening the package. It is perfect because were it is placed is hard to get at to turn it on and off so being able to control from my phone is much better. Lighting is great and love all the options. Tried it synced to the music as well and can see how that would be a cool setting when having a gathering.
